document.full_text: rovio, the developer of the "angry birds" mobile game, plans a u.s. initial public offering in the next five years, a move that could give investors a chance to tap into the fastest growing segment of the video game industry.
document.title: angry birds developer takes aims at new york ipo
lines_and_colors: rovio, the developer of the "angry birds" mobile game, plans a u.s. initial public offering in the next five years, a move that could give investors a chance to tap into the fastest growing segment of the video game industry.
